item.title: Another day at Sugar Kitty - Prequel #1
Another day at SugarKitty. #1
item.description: Tags: #Story #SugarKitty #SliceOfLife (ooc: 2021-10-07) Nora saw Yazad approaching and waved. Nora : “Heya Jazzywazzy!” Yazad : Hello, Nora ~ You are looking rather radiant today~ Yazad : New hair? Nora : “I braided and combed my hair! Yazad : “I noticed~ It really frames your face rather well~ Nora : “Why thank you~” Nora : “I took a nap day yesterday, sorry for not showing up to work~

item.title: Clara meets Lumina for the first time
Clara meets Yazad and Yokai for the first time
Meeting Anora Casan, Benedict Varden, and Custodian.
